node.title: Peña stuns Nunes in UFC 269 upset, Aussie Tuivasa posts fourth straight win
node.alt: A female UFC fighter celebrates a victory in Las Vegas.
node.description: Julianna Peña stops Brazilian legend Amanda Nunes by submission in the second round at UFC 269 in Las Vegas, while Australian heavyweight Tai Tuivasa adds another victory his growing tally.
node.content:
["Julianna Pe\u00f1a\u00a0has stopped Brazilian legend Amanda Nunes by submission in the second round at UFC 269 in Las Vegas, claiming the bantamweight title from the\u00a0two-division champion.", "Australian heavyweight Tai Tuivasa also won in Las Vegas, while Charles Oliveira defended his lightweight title for the first time with a third-round stoppage victory over Dustin Poirier.", "American Pe\u00f1a\u00a0was a 10-1 underdog against the vaunted Nunes, widely considered the greatest fighter in the history of women's mixed martial arts.", "Nunes had won 12 consecutive fights since 2014 and reigned simultaneously atop the 135-pound bantamweight and 145-pound featherweight divisions for three years.", "After Nunes largely dominated the first round with two knockdowns and superior striking, Pe\u00f1a\u00a0shockingly hurt Nunes with punches in a slugfest start to the second round.", "Pe\u00f1a\u00a0then got Nunes to the ground on her back and forced the champion to tap out with a choke around her neck with 1\u00a0minute and 38 seconds\u00a0left.", "\"It feels crazy,\"\u00a0Pe\u00f1a\u00a0said.", "\"I definitely expected to win, but the world is my oyster.\"", "
Brutal Tuivasa wins again
", "Tuivasa is fast becoming a UFC cult hero after being drenched in beer by fans in Las Vegas after\u00a0a fourth straight knockout victory.", "His violent second-round knockout of Brazil's Augusto Sakai was quickly followed by a trademark shoey sitting atop the octagon fence.", "Tuivasa filled a shoe with beer and drank it while his opponent lay prone on the canvas.", "He then repeated the gimmick and was showered with more beer as he left the arena, having entered it to the tune of Aqua's Barbie Girl.", "The victory \u2014\u00a0coming via a left hook and furious spray of follow-ups \u2014\u00a0came after three first-round wins for the Sydney-based Tuivasa.", "It was his 14th career win and 13th via stoppage.", "Oliveira\u00a0survived a rough fight with Poirier\u00a0to improve to 10-0 with nine stoppage victories since 2017.", "Poirier battered Oliveira\u00a0with punches in the first round and knocked him down twice.", "But Oliveira took control on the ground in the second round with a series of vicious elbows.", "He finished the fight with just under 4\u00a0minutes left in the third round by attaching himself to Poirier's back and forcing him to tap while standing up.", "Among other bouts, New Zealand flyweight Kai Kara-France stopped former bantamweight champ Cody Garbrandt with a series of massive strikes in the first round.", "Former bantamweight champion Dominick Cruz also rallied for a unanimous decision over Pedro Munhoz.", "AP/AAP"]
